yes
just do the midair inputs
but here's the unfortunate part: this setup only "just works" if the mechakoopa is in an even sprite slot
(because the stun timer can only run out on every other frame and you don't want to interact with the mechakoopa on the frame it leaves your hands)
you *can* just drop it down there with good timing

hold Y

you need to pre-hold run to be runnng before grabbing

if you use frame advance enough, you can switch Y -> X on the critical frame
you hold right, Y, B, then add in down, X, A on the frame
it's a duckfly that's also a throwblock jump
